text: @TMobile @Tesla I’m really hoping that I win!! This is one of my dream cars and I would go and visit my grandma and take her on a road trip because she’s been stuck in the house since the beginning of COVID-19 🤞🏽🤞🏽 when will the winner be drawn? https://t.co/ZngQxA5kly
